tspan.tspan: At what point does "praying to the same God, just by another name" become
idol worship?

text.tspan: Why is prayer such a central part to so many religions?
Is it possible to be unworthy of offering a prayer?
If prayer was a color, what color would it be?

tspan.tspan: How can I help someone address Heavenly Father in prayer
when their earthly father was bad or abusive?
Is it possible to measure the efficacy of prayer
through empirical analysis, especially in
healing the sick?

text.tspan: Should we focus on breadth or depth of topic when we pray?
What are the advantages of holding hands around a circle for prayer?
Why is prayer such a central part to so many different cultures and religions?
What are the main differences in the ways people pray today?

tspan.tspan: Prayer warrior is a term used by many evangelical
and other Christians. Is it appropriate to think
of prayer in terms of war?
If I fall asleep during a prayer, should I try
to continue where I left off when I wake up?

text.tspan: Does God get mad when I ask for something I shouldn't in prayer?

tspan.tspan: What does it mean to
be too flowery during
a prayer?
Is it appropriate to bear your
testimony in prayer?

text.tspan: Is not praying the most frequent and troubling sin?

tspan.tspan: Has the "pause and wait for God to answer before continuing with your
prayer" technique ever worked for you?
Is prayer meant to evolve into some general form of
communication post-mortality?

text.tspan: Will we always pray?
Does God still pray?
Did we pray before we came to Earth?
Do dead people pray?
Do resurrected people pray?
How do we learn to pray?
What is the point of praying alone?
What does God really do when we pray?
What are the origins of the Temple prayer roll?
Do I have a responsibility to add names to the prayer roll in the Temple?
If kneeling to pray is not a sign of respect/reverence in my culture, should I still pray kneeling down?
If I am fully aware of who I am talking to, and He is fully capable of hearing me just the same, why do I need to address Him directly?
Should I still pray if I feel I don't have anything new to say?
Do animals pray?
Do babies pray?
When Christ comes again, will we pray to Him just like the Nephites prayed to Him?
The Nephites were given what they should pray by the power of the Holy Ghost. Is that our end goal with prayer, or would God rather us come up with the things to say ourselves?
Should we say "amen" to a prayer we don't agree with?

tspan.tspan: According to the Bible Dictionary, "We pray in Christ’s name when our mind is the mind of Christ, and our wishes the wishes of
Christ—when His words abide in us (John 15:7). We then ask for things it is possible for God to grant." How can we know our
mind is the mind of Christ's?

text.tspan: Do adults pray better than kids?
What about prayer makes it worship?

tspan.tspan: If we doubt whether we've really prayed in Christ's
name, should we still end with the words "in the name of
Jesus Christ, Amen?"

text.tspan: How do I avoid vain repetitions?
Is meditation a form of prayer?
Should we offer intercessory prayers?
What is the Holy Ghost's role in teaching us how to pray?
What can I do to keep my mind from wandering when I pray?
Is it possible to pray to someone other than God, or just discouraged?
Why are some people named Pray?

tspan.tspan: Modern Prophets have suggested that Idol worship today might take the form of things like playing too
many video games, or being too much a fan of celebrities. Does that mean we don't have to worry about
more traditional idol worship anymore?

text.tspan: Can a Priesthood Ordinance prayer be offered up over Zoom?
When is it ok to tell someone they are praying wrong?
How can you help someone who doesn't feel comfortable praying to pray?

tspan.tspan: Is it ok for me to write down my
prayers in advance?

text.tspan: Is it ok to act out my prayers through interpretative dance?

tspan.tspan: If "the song of the righteous is a prayer unto [God]
(Doctrine & Covenants 25:12)" then what does that tell us
about prayer?
Is it ok to have more than
one spokesperson in a group
prayer?

text.tspan: Is a Priesthood blessing a prayer?
Are Priesthood ordinances prayers?
What is an intercessory prayer?

tspan.tspan: Why do they teach that we should have our
eyes closed during the prayer?
Is it ok for me to record
my prayers so I can
remember them later?

text.tspan: Which came first, the prayer or the revelation?
Should we worry about Priesthood Ordinance prayers becoming vain repetitions?
What do you think about keeping up some sense of continuity from one prayer to the next?
Besides the word "prayer" itself, what is the best word for prayer?
How many prayers do we offer in our lifetimes?
What is the origin of ancestor worship through prayer?
Have you ever felt God's presence during a prayer?
For much of the Old Testament it was custom to pray 3 times a day. Why?
What is Satan's counterfeit to prayer?
Does God ever delegate the listening to prayers part?

tspan.tspan: Does God ever laugh at things said in
prayers?

textPath.tspan: I know people pray a lot, but does God ever stop to think/react to a prayer as he goes about his day?

tspan.tspan: Is it appropriate to make bearing your
testimony sound as if you’re praying to
God.
